subject: Re: [junit] [ANN] EMMA: a free and fast code coverage tool
msgSnippet: ... Has anyone integrated EMMA into Maven? Can I use it in place of Clover? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com ::
messageBody:
Vlad R wrote:

> EMMA (http://emma.sourceforge.net) is a Java code
> coverage tool based on bytecode instrumentation. Whilst not the only
> tool on the market right now, EMMA strives to be different by being
> very lightweight, flexible, and fast.

Has anyone integrated EMMA into Maven? Can I use it in place of Clover?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
